title: AI Engineering Lab with Time-Limited Licenses
summary: First government CAIO from consumer tech (Spotify/Facebook), AI Engineering Lab with 6-month tool licenses to force evaluation and prevent vendor lock-in

content.whatItIs: The UK Government appointed Kalbir Sohi as its first Chief AI Officer, overseeing AI teams at the Government Digital Service. The hire from consumer tech (Spotify, Facebook) represents a significant departure from traditional government technology leadership.
howItWorks: CAIO appointed from consumer tech background: Product Director at Spotify Core Infrastructure, senior roles at Facebook
2B pound AI investment (2026-2030), with up to 137M pounds allocated for AI Engineering Lab
AI Engineering Lab launches early 2026 with time-limited licenses (up to 6 months) for Microsoft Copilot, Gemini, Amazon Q/Kiro, Claude
Time-limited approach is intentional: forces evaluation, prevents vendor lock-in, enables comparison
Builds on existing: Ministry of Justice ChatGPT Enterprise, 'Humphrey' and 'Consult' Whitehall AI tools
content.coreInsight: For government AI transformation, recruit technology leaders from consumer tech, not traditional government IT. Time-limited AI licenses (6 months) force evaluation and prevent vendor lock-in while enabling experimentation with multiple platforms. Centralizing AI strategy under a CAIO (not buried in IT) signals organizational priority and enables cross-department coordination.
content.keyMetrics: 2B pound total AI investment 2026-2030. Up to 137M pounds for AI-enabled breakthroughs. 6-month license terms for evaluation.
